intro: Celmisia sessiliflora, commonly known as the narrow-leaved celmisia, is a flowering plant native to New Zealand. It belongs to the family Gentianaceae and is characterized by its compact, shrub-like growth habit. Celmisia sessiliflora thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often found in forested areas of the South Island.
